accuracy.description: The correctness of the answer provided by the agent.

completeness.description: The extent to which all required steps to answer the question were successfully completed.

relevance.description: The relevance of the answer and its components to the question asked.

traceability.description: The ability to trace and understand the reasoning process of the agent.

efficiency.description: How efficiently the agent completes the task in terms of resources used, such as time and computational power.

resourcefulness.description: The agent's ability to overcome obstacles and use available resources effectively to achieve the goal.

robustness.description: The agent's ability to handle different types of questions and unforeseen situations without failing.

originality.description: The level of creativity and original thinking in the agent's approach to solving the task.

data_contamination.description: The extent to which the solution derived from the agent is free of data contamination from internet plain text or other sources.

interpretability.description: The extent to which the agentâ€™s actions and outputs can be understood and interpreted by humans.
